title: Paradise Vegetarian
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Buffet, Juice bar, Take-out, Sri Lankan
description: A first in Sri Lanka official sinhalese vegetarian cafe, located inside Buddhist Cultural Center complex. Offers breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Mostly vegan except some milk sweets and milk soup. Try anoda juice and woodapple juice. Near the Laksala souvenier shop, a popular tourist destination.
streetAddress: Lauries Rd, Buddhist Cultural Center, Sri Sambuddhathva Jayanthi Mawatha
